about.p1: AI Solutions Architect from 42 Paris, I bridge the gap between deep technical expertise and a Product Builder mindset.
about.p2: Beyond infrastructure (Python, Docker, SQL), I design high-performance, scalable products (Web & Mobile) focused on user experience.
about.p3: Continuous learning via OpenClassrooms, Udemy, Coursera, edX, and community-driven knowledge bases like freeCodeCamp.
about.p4: Trilingual Specialist: RU | EN | FR. Dedicated to optimizing complex systems and building scalable tech solutions for global entities.
